snippet: Franklin Sirmans takes over as the institution has committed to increasing its private contributions in a city without a tradition of cultural philanthropy.
abstract: Franklin Sirmans begins his first museum directorship at Perez Art Museum Miami confident he can inspire donations to organization; former Los Angeles County Museum of Art curator acknowledges specific challenges to raising funds.
lead_paragraph: Franklin Sirmans takes over as the institution has committed to increasing its private contributions in a city without a tradition of cultural philanthropy.

headline.main: First-Time Director Settles In at Pérez Art Museum Miami
headline.print_headline: New Tone  for a Miami Museum

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Perez, Jorge M, Art Museum of Miami-Dade County
